title: Dreamscape Dawn Muralist
prompt: (masterpiece), best quality, highly detailed, expressive lines, 9:16 vertical aspect ratio, (2D Anime illustration style), vibrant colors, soft sunrise lighting. A determined young male street artist with spiky blue hair, wearing denim overalls, stands next to a massive red brick wall, actively painting a complex, colorful mural. The mural itself features a whimsical floating island landscape, complete with a fantastical small town, a bright pink cherry blossom tree, and a large, smiling cartoon creature. He holds a paint brush and a wooden palette. In the background, a sprawling urban city skyline is silhouetted against the soft pastel pink and orange dawn sky. A single street lamp provides warm light. Cobblestone street, scattered paint cans and art materials on the pavement, full body shot.
negativePrompt: lowres, worst quality, grayscale, monochrome, 3D render, photorealistic, deformed, mutated, bad anatomy, ugly, watermark, logo, disconnected, signature, blurry, extra fingers, poorly drawn hands, boring background, multiple figures.
